project.description: A simple and responsive chess board clone built using CSS Grid to create a clean and organized board structure.

project.description: A simple and interactive color switcher built using JavaScript, allowing users to change the background color with a click.

project.description: A fun and interactive project that generates random colors at the click of a button using JavaScript.

project.description: A BMI calculator that lets users input their weight and height to calculate their Body Mass Index. It provides instant feedback and result.

project.description: A simple and interactive to-do list app built with JavaScript, allowing users to add, delete, and mark tasks as complete.

project.description: A playful hearts animation created with HTML, CSS, and js. When hovered, the generates random size hearts.

project.description: A functional stopwatch built with JavaScript, featuring start, stop, and reset buttons.

project.description: A dynamic countdown timer built with JavaScript, perfect for tracking time until a giveaway ends.

project.description: A fun and interactive math quiz game that challenges users with random questions. It updates the score in real-time.

project.description: A web app that fetches and displays GitHub user data using the Fetch API. It shows profile details username, bio, image etc.

project.name: weather app with js
project.description: A sleek weather app that fetches real-time weather data using an API. It displays temperature, conditions, and location, showcasing API integration.

project.name: unsplash image search app
project.description: A dynamic image search app that fetches stunning photos from the Unsplash API. It allows users to search and browse high-quality images.

project.name: music player app
project.description: A fully functional music player app built with JavaScript, featuring play, pause, next, and previous controls.

project.name: rest countries explorer app
project.description: A comprehensive web app that fetches and displays data from the REST Countries API. It showcases details like population, region, languages, and flags for each country, with features like search, filter, and dark mode.

project.name: hexagon hover hnimation effect
project.description: A stylish hexagon animation effect created with HTML and CSS, where hexagons respond to hover with smooth transitions, color changes, or scale effects.
